Reviews.Content: 3 visited berlin weekend stayed recommended friends arrived midnight luckily kiwi restaurant door unfortunately booking wrong arrive night little fuss allocated photos private entrance onto street people please tram runs past hostel bit noisy apart hostel clean nice hot showers cooking facilities lounge tv free wifi relax theres fixed computers log onto glen manager friendly hand recommend plenty eat local ubahn 5 minute walk hostel runs straight alexanderplatz definitely recommend heading tv tower wish book online beforehand avoid queues allows bearings whilst taking view city head brandenburg gate join free walking tours lasts 34 hours youll learn lot pay tour worth berlin city major touristy bits weekend city potsdam travellers worth visit time hostel based experience definitely look option travelling future

Reviews.Content: stayed ago friend holiday staff nice owner especially funny guy beds comfy clean nicely decorated bathroom reasonably sized kitchen equipped lot cook own food social overcrowded lot effort hostel nice definitely stay subway isnt 10 mins walking quiet cool shops
